meanings.sent1: In the hospital, nondoctors help with paperwork and scheduling.
meanings.sent2: The clinic is run by nondoctors who specialize in different areas.
meanings.sent3: The nondoctors at the pharmacy always have a smile for the patients.
meanings.sent4: Even though they are nondoctors, their dedication to patient care is commendable.
meanings.sent5: The community health fair was organized by a team of nondoctors.

meanings.definition: Those who do not have a medical degree.
meanings.sent1: Nondoctors play a crucial role in supporting medical professionals.
meanings.sent2: The conference welcomed nondoctors to participate in the discussions.
meanings.sent3: The nondoctors in the research lab are eager to learn from the experts.
meanings.sent4: Despite being nondoctors, they contribute valuable insights to the team.
meanings.sent5: The hospital's volunteer program attracts many nondoctors who want to help.
